sense.name: vanish without trace
sense.examples: The search was called off for the sailors who disappeared in the storm. This is a way of life that is fast disappearing. I can't find my keys anywhere - they've completely disappeared. The sun disappeared behind a cloud. We looked for her but she had disappeared into the crowd. The film is about a girl who mysteriously disappeared while on a picnic at Hanging Rock. I don't know how it's possible for a person to disappear without trace.
